channel.title: CVE Feed for Welcart Inc. -- Welcart e-Commerce
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Welcart Inc. -- Welcart e-Commerce

item.title: CVE-2024-45366|2024-09-18T15:05:08.747Z -- welcart%20inc. -- welcart%20e-commerce
item.description: Welcart e-Commerce prior to 2.11.2 contains a cross-site scripting vulnerability. If this vulnerability is exploited, an arbitrary script may be executed on the user's web browser.

item.title: CVE-2024-42404|2024-09-18T15:19:17.953Z -- welcart%20inc. -- welcart%20e-commerce
item.description: SQL injection vulnerability in Welcart e-Commerce prior to 2.11.2 allows an attacker who can login to the product to obtain or alter the information stored in the database.

item.title: CVE-2024-32144|2024-08-09T18:35:59.031Z -- welcart%20inc. -- welcart%20e-commerce
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Welcart Inc. Welcart e-Commerce.This issue affects Welcart e-Commerce: from n/a through 2.9.14.

item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Welcart Inc. Welcart e-Commerce.This issue affects Welcart e-Commerce: from n/a through 2.9.14.

item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Welcart Inc. Welcart e-Commerce.This issue affects Welcart e-Commerce: from n/a through 2.9.14.

item.description: SQL injection vulnerability in Welcart e-Commerce prior to 2.11.2 allows an attacker who can login to the product to obtain or alter the information stored in the database.

item.description: Welcart e-Commerce prior to 2.11.2 contains a cross-site scripting vulnerability. If this vulnerability is exploited, an arbitrary script may be executed on the user's web browser.
